name: Arctic_Duck_Boots
description: The Arctic Duck Boots are a pair of beige boots for cold weather.

name: Desert_Chukkas
description: The Desert Chukkas are a pair of sand-colored chukka boots. The quarter covers the tongue, held with dried natural fiber laces. A cork Barazushi stitch is located on the outer sides, along with a small Barazushi writing on the foxing.

name: Fuzzy_Boots
description: The Fuzzy Boots are a pair of chestnut sheepskin boots. The insides are lined with cream-colored faux fur, and they have tan outsoles. At the top of each boot a brown Barazushi logo is sewn onto the side facing outward. A brown designer label is sewn onto the back of both boots at the bottom. they share a similar design to UGG Boots

name: Suede_Basics
description: The Suede Basics are a pair of suede shoes with a minimalistic design. The vamp is light grey, covered in a darker suede overlay. The tongue seems quite stiff, held in place by colouristically matching laces. It also has a Barazushi logo engraved on it's top. The soles are light brown and possess rows of three dots each, located singularly on the sides. The foxing presents a small logo resembling a stylised squid and a thin collar above.

name: Suede_Bosses
description: The Suede Bosses are a pair of suede shoes with a minimalistic design. The vamp is pitch black, covered in a lighter suede overlay. The tongue seems quite stiff, held in place by colouristically matching laces. It also has a Barazushi logo engraved on it's top. The soles are tan brown and possess rows of three dots each, located singularly on the sides. The foxing presents a small logo resembling a stylised squid and a thin collar above.

name: White_Lo-Vert_Hi-Tops
description: The White Lo-Vert Hi-Tops are a pair of white sneakers with the Barazushi logo, in written form, on the front.
